\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 43552}

\subsection*{Itching Diminishes Positive Effects}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Awake at Last}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &   & oral & Amphetamines & daily\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 180.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I was given Adderall prescription to help with my ADD.  It was wonderful, like coming out of a life long fog.  I was able to experience emotions, communicate, think clearly, be organize, sense of well being [lost weight! yeh] but it has one side effect for me that negates almost all of the positive ones.  Starting at 30 mg and higher, my scalp starts to itch.  I drives me crazy.  Unfortunately, the medication helps me to focus on the itching.  My doctor was no help in solving this problem.  I have relentless searched the internet without finding a solution.  I have already tried antihistamines and they does not work, from Benedryl to Zrytec.

\end{document}
